div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 218px; height: 1px; padding-top: 17px; margin-left: 11px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 100px; margin-left: 32px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: 1.输入用户名和密码，并请求登录

switch.text: 1.输入用户名和密码，并请求登录

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 145px; margin-left: 472px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: 2.验证用户名和密码，若合法，则生成Token，Token中包含登录用户的登录状态

switch.text: 2.验证用户名和密码，若合法，则生成Token，Token中包含登录用户的登录状态

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 190px; margin-left: 32px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: 3.将Token保存到浏览器的本地存储(Local Storage)

switch.text: 3.将Token保存到浏览器的本地存储(Local Storage)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 265px; margin-left: 472px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: 4.验证Token，若合法，则从中提取用户的登录状态，根据此决定是否提供服务

switch.text: 4.验证Token，若合法，则从中提取用户的登录状态，根据此决定是否提供服务
